name: Parasma
description: Warning: There is no antidote if picked up by the wrong end.

abilities.name: Witch Blade
abilities.description: The next attack poisons the target, slowing their movement speed and dealing damage over time, based on the wielder's intelligence. This attack cannot miss.
notes: The effect triggers upon landing the attack point of an attack, regardless of whether the attack lands or not
The cooldown triggers upon landing an attack, so missed or disjointed attacks do not trigger it
The attack has True Strike, so it cannot miss
Uses a custom projectile when the wielder is ranged
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration
Does not affect Buildings, Ward-type units, or Ally units
Deals damage in 1-second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is applied, resulting in 4 instances
Can deal up to 300% of the wielder's intelligence as damage (before reductions)

abilities.name: Magic Corruption
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks apply a magic resistance reducing debuff on enemy units.
notes: The magic resistance reduction value does not stack
Reapplying the debuff refreshes the duration
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance
Affects Allied units and Ward-type units

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 480 mana, 2 mana regeneration and 4% flat base magic resistance
40 main attack damage to intelligence heroes
18 main attack damage to universal heroes
The projectile speed bonus only affects attack projectiles
Can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop
